kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent: Thanks, Danielle, for the feedback and great question. \ \ Currently, there is no option to add a custom knowledge base or instructions on the roadmap, but we are more than aware of this use case, and some technological choices, such as the use of Semantic Kernel, are moving us towards something like this. (option to connect custom vector db or in-memory vector store)\ \ Our partners directly influence the final experience for content editors and marketers through their custom implementations, so it makes perfect sense for AIRA to be able to advise on these changes.
